entry.title: Homelab Setup
entry.content:
I’m building a homelab for virtualization and development of Ai applications and other random widgets.

  • Cisco 24port POE gigabit switch

  • pfSense
    • Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7500 CPU 3.40GHZ
    • Intel i350-T4 4x gigabit NIC
  • Supermicro X11DPH-T
    • Dual Xeon Gold 6138 (40C/80T, 2.0GHz, 3.7GHz boost)
    • 160GB Hyinx DDR4-2666 ECC (10x16gb)
    • 4x gtx1080
    • Dual 10GbE
    • 2x2tb NVMe m.2
    • 4x10tb HHD
    • IPMI remote management
  • AMD Ryzen 3500
    • RTX 2080ti
    • 2x gtx1080
    • 2TB pcie4 NVME
entry.summary: I’m building a homelab for virtualization and development of Ai applications and other random widgets.
